one_reviews_text: Ok game, moderate gfx, but you cannot sit comfortably and play, you often have to stand up and move your arms around. Dispite it should be supported, the Oculus Remote does nothing.

A very nice and interesting game that has potential to be even greater. A naration between levels with a nice storyline would be great and some texture to the invironments mabe. 

The gameply is interesting and very nicely integreted in VR. The firs few levels are too easy in comprison to the others but that is all.

Hope for more levels to come ...

This did nothing for me, it was very easy & i soon got bored as the visuals are not really very good. Music was pretty annoying so can't see me going back to it there are much better puzzle games out there imo.
it's nice to take a brake from virtual rickality and have nice fune puzzles.  great game!!!
